content.description: On the backside of the boulder, there is a face in the shape of a shallow V. This route climbs the right of the two seams. You start on the rock at the base, reach up to a small crimp then get a high foot, pull on, switch feet and work slightly left up to better holds, and a good top out.
content.protection: Multiple pads and spotters for the horrible fall. You can fall between the face and the rock you start on or to the left of the starting rock and get seriously hurt. Please be careful.
content.location:
When in The Pound look up the hill you will see a large overhang. Walk up to this and go around left to the backside of this boulder the route is the right of the two seams in the shallow "v" that is formed by the rock. 

  Start on the block at the base of the route.

content.description:
Sit start on the start hold at the very bottom of the overhung traversing rock put your feet on good start holds and pull up a good two finger pocket then reach to a bad little dent in the rock bring your hand up for another two finger pocket when you reach the good jug holds you will be fine just keep traversing right until you can't anymore then go straight up for the finish 

  Awesome climb just dangerous yet again be careful of the sharp jagged rocks underneath you.
content.protection: Pads and a good spotter for sake of the rocks being under you
content.location: Walk up from Prow Wow until you see Where the Red Fern Grows turn around and you will see a boulder with a fairly long traverse on it and a horrible landing

content.description:
There are two little crimps one at about face height and one above your head if you're not like 7 ft. tall. On the right side of the little arete there is a very good but little foot hold. Power pop up off the ground and get your left foot in this little mossy hole in the rock right above the bottom lip reach up to grab a little side pull then bump up to a good left pinch then top out 

  This is a stand start stand in between the two little boulders and place your right foot first with the two good crimps 

  Very fun climb but it could be dangerous so be careful.
content.protection: Pad and good spotter. There is a steep fall onto some jagged boulders and you could go all the way under the boulder too. So be careful!
content.location: Just to the left of Where the Red Fern Grows you will notice two littler boulders stand in between them.

content.description:
Walk into the Pound and walk uphill once past all established boulders you will see a large overhang up the hill, the problems in this area are around this overhang, and this is your focal point for finding the area. 

  This ares has a lot of potential, just needs a little love.
